title: Android System Autofill Leak
body:
(Reopen of #776 since it appears closed issues are not monitored)

### LeakTrace information

```
ApplicationLeak(className=com.myapp.Activity, leakTrace=
┬
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$SendChannel
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    GC Root: Global variable in native code
│    ↓ AssistStructure$SendChannel.mAssistStructure
│                                  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ AssistStructure.mWindowNodes
│                      ~~~~~~~~~~~~
├─ java.util.ArrayList
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ ArrayList.elementData
│                ~~~~~~~~~~~
├─ java.lang.Object[]
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ array Object[].[0]
│                     ~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$WindowNode
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ AssistStructure$WindowNode.mRoot
│                                 ~~~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$ViewNode
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ AssistStructure$ViewNode.mChildren
│                               ~~~~~~~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$ViewNode[]
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ array AssistStructure$ViewNode[].[0]
│                                       ~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$ViewNode
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ AssistStructure$ViewNode.mChildren
│                               ~~~~~~~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$ViewNode[]
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ array AssistStructure$ViewNode[].[1]
│                                       ~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$ViewNode
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ AssistStructure$ViewNode.mChildren
│                               ~~~~~~~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$ViewNode[]
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ array AssistStructure$ViewNode[].[0]
│                                       ~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$ViewNode
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ AssistStructure$ViewNode.mChildren
│                               ~~~~~~~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$ViewNode[]
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ array AssistStructure$ViewNode[].[0]
│                                       ~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$ViewNode
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ AssistStructure$ViewNode.mChildren
│                               ~~~~~~~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$ViewNode[]
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ array AssistStructure$ViewNode[].[5]
│                                       ~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$ViewNode
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ AssistStructure$ViewNode.mText
│                               ~~~~~
├─ android.app.assist.AssistStructure$ViewNodeText
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ AssistStructure$ViewNodeText.mText
│                                   ~~~~~
├─ android.text.SpannableStringBuilder
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ SpannableStringBuilder.mSpans
│                             ~~~~~~
├─ java.lang.Object[]
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ array Object[].[0]
│                     ~~~
├─ com.myapp.spans.ClickSpan
│    Leaking: UNKNOWN
│    ↓ ClickSpan.listener
│                ~~~~~~~~
├─ com.myapp.MyFragment
│    Leaking: YES (Fragment#mFragmentManager is null)
│    ↓ MyFragment.textBox
├─ com.myapp.views.MyTextView
│    Leaking: YES (MyFragment is leaking and View.mContext references a destroyed activity)
│    mContext instance of com.myapp.Activity with mDestroyed = true
│    View#mParent is set
│    View#mAttachInfo is null (view detached)
│    View.mWindowAttachCount = 1
│    ↓ MyTextView.mContext
╰→ com.myapp.Activity
​     Leaking: YES (MyTextView is leaking and Activity#mDestroyed is true and ObjectWatcher was watching this)
​     key = 61f611e3-b757-4c34-9a4f-d5369ba35865
​     watchDurationMillis = 4924
​     retainedDurationMillis = -89
, retainedHeapByteSize=124)
```

This is on OnePlus 7 Pro (GM1913) running Android 9.
